<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">534ad6883b6e3a10bc1ccdd643e45ac7</macroponent><name>Validate Before Add File</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers}) {

    
    const docSelection = api.state.selectedDocType;
    console.log('api',api);
     console.log('event',event);
      console.log('helpers',helpers);

    // ตรวจสอบว่ามีค่าถูกเลือกหรือไม่
    if (!docSelection || docSelection === "" || docSelection === null )  {
        console.log('docSelection',api.state.selectedDocType);
        var messages =[];
       messages.push('กรุณาเลือกชือเอกสาร');
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-28 04:51:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>79d73f483bb27610bc1ccdd643e45a1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Before Add File</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BOT Application" source="x_1896436_bot_ap_0">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="BOT Application">566dc70e3b527210bc1ccdd643e45a0f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_79d73f483bb27610bc1ccdd643e45a1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-28 08:56:40</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
